meanings.meaning_en_US: To be in charge of or to control a business, organization, or a group of people.

examples.sentence: She hopes to [manage] a large company one day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她希望有一天能管理一家大公司。

examples.sentence: It is challenging to [manage] a diverse team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 管理多元化的團隊是具有挑戰性的。

examples.sentence: They will [manage] the event together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們將共同管理這個活動。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The emergence of a baby or other young from the body of its parent.

examples.sentence: The baby’s [birth] was celebrated by the family.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個寶寶的出生受到家庭的祝賀

examples.sentence: She prepared for the [birth] with great anticipation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她期待著這次的出生

examples.sentence: The hospital was ready for the [birth] of the triplets.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫院為三胞胎的出生做好了準備

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause to move or be apart.

examples.sentence: He tried to [separate] the two fighting dogs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他試圖把兩隻打架的狗分開。

examples.sentence: Please [separate] the trash by type.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請按類別將垃圾分開。

examples.sentence: They decided to [separate] for a while.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定暫時分開。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of leading a group of people or an organization.

examples.sentence: Her [leadership] style inspires others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的領導風格激勵著其他人

examples.sentence: Effective [leadership] is crucial during a crisis.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在危機期間，有效的領導至關重要

examples.sentence: The [leadership] training program was beneficial.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個領導培訓計劃是有益的

meanings.meaning_en_US: A series of connected links used for fastening or securing.

examples.sentence: She wore a silver [chain] around her neck.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她脖子上戴著一條銀鏈

examples.sentence: The [chain] broke, and the fence fell down.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鏈條斷了，圍欄倒了

examples.sentence: They formed a [chain] of volunteers to clean the park.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們組成了一個志願者鏈來清理公園

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the running of a home or to family relations.

examples.sentence: The [domestic] issues were discussed at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議上討論了家庭問題。

examples.sentence: She prefers [domestic] travel over international trips.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡國內旅行而不是國際旅行。

examples.sentence: The [domestic] market is growing rapidly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 國內市場正在迅速增長。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Physical harm caused to something.

examples.sentence: The storm caused significant [damage] to the roof.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風暴對屋頂造成了重大損害。

examples.sentence: Her negligence resulted in [damage] to the car.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的疏忽導致了汽車損壞。

examples.sentence: You must pay for any [damage] you cause.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你必須為造成的任何損害支付賠償。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To create or manufacture something.

examples.sentence: The factory will [produce] more cars this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這家工廠今年將生產更多汽車

examples.sentence: They aim to [produce] high-quality films.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的目標是製作高品質的電影

examples.sentence: Farmers [produce] a variety of crops each season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 農民每個季節生產各種農作物

meanings.meaning_en_US: The lack of success in achieving a goal.

examples.sentence: His first attempt was a total [failure].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的第一次嘗試完全失敗了。

examples.sentence: They learned from their [failure].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們從失敗中學到了教訓。

examples.sentence: The project was deemed a [failure] by the committee.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目被委員會視為失敗。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The period from Friday evening through Sunday evening, especially regarded as a time for relaxation or recreation.

examples.sentence: I always look forward to the [weekend].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我總是期待週末。

examples.sentence: We plan to go hiking this [weekend].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們計劃這個週末去爬山。

examples.sentence: The [weekend] is a great time to relax.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 週末是放鬆的好時光。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A visual representation of data.

examples.sentence: He created a [chart] to visualize the sales data.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他創建了一個圖表來視覺化銷售數據。

examples.sentence: The [chart] shows trends over the last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這張圖表顯示了過去一年的趨勢。

examples.sentence: Students must learn to read a [chart] in math class.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學生必須學會在數學課上閱讀圖表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To organize information visually.

examples.sentence: We will [chart] the progress of the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們將繪製項目的進展。

examples.sentence: She decided to [chart] her financial goals.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定繪製她的財務目標。

examples.sentence: The team will [chart] the timeline for the launch.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊將繪製發佈的時間表。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being the same in quantity, quality, or degree.

examples.sentence: All people should have [equal] rights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 所有人應該擁有平等的權利。

examples.sentence: The two teams are [equal] in skill.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這兩支隊伍的技術是相等的。

examples.sentence: Make sure the measurements are [equal].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保這些測量是相等的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: On the day before today.

examples.sentence: We went to the beach [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們昨天去了海灘。

examples.sentence: I finished the book [yesterday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨天完成了這本書。

examples.sentence: She called me [yesterday] to discuss the plans.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她昨天打電話給我討論計劃。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having the color or appearance of gold; valuable or excellent.

examples.sentence: The sunset painted the sky a beautiful [golden] hue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 日落把天空染成美麗的金色。

examples.sentence: He received a [golden] opportunity to work abroad.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他獲得了一個出國工作的難得機會。

examples.sentence: Her [golden] voice captivated the entire audience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的金色嗓音吸引了整個觀眾。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Related to or involving electricity or electrical devices.

examples.sentence: We hired an [electrical] engineer for the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們為這個項目雇了一位電氣工程師。

examples.sentence: The [electrical] connections need to be checked.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 需要檢查電氣連接。

examples.sentence: He specializes in [electrical] systems.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他專注於電氣系統。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A repeated decorative design.

examples.sentence: The dress had a floral [pattern].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件裙子有花卉圖案。

examples.sentence: We studied the [pattern] of the data collected.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們研究了收集到的數據圖案。

examples.sentence: She knitted a blanket with a unique [pattern].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她編織了一條帶有獨特圖案的毛毯。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the ancient Greek and Roman world or to traditional forms of art and literature.

examples.sentence: She enjoys listening to [classical] music during her study time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她喜歡在學習時聽古典音樂

examples.sentence: The painting is a great example of [classical] art.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這幅畫是古典藝術的一個很好的例子

examples.sentence: He studied [classical] literature in college.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在大學學習古典文學

meanings.meaning_en_US: The course or path on which something moves or points.

examples.sentence: Please follow the [direction] on the sign.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請按照告示牌上的指示行進

examples.sentence: The wind is blowing in the opposite [direction].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 風正朝著相反的方向吹

examples.sentence: He needs to get clear [direction] on his project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要對他的項目有清楚的指導

meanings.meaning_en_US: The organ of the body that is located in the head and controls thoughts, feelings, and movements.

examples.sentence: He has a brilliant [brain].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的頭腦非常聰明。

examples.sentence: The [brain] can process a lot of information.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 大腦可以處理大量信息。

examples.sentence: Studying stimulates the [brain].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學習能夠刺激大腦。
